summary: An emotionally cold man leaves the safety of his Alpine home to seek a heart transplant and an estranged son.
cast: Michel Subor|Grégoire Colin|Yekaterina Golubeva|Bambou|Florence Loiret Caille|Lolita Chammah|Alex Descas|Dong-ho Kim|Se-tak Chang|Hong-suk Park|Edwin Alin|Henri Tetainanuarii|Jean-Marc Teriipaia|Anna Tetuaveroa|Béatrice Dalle
title: El intruso
